DOC.brief_summary: Five percent young woman meet criterion anorexia nervosa , bulimia nervosa , binge eat disorder , another 5 % meeting criterion Eating Disorder Not Otherwise Specified ( ED-NOS ) , include subthreshold variant disorder . Over half present eat disorder treatment meet criterion ED-NOS threshold case ED-NOS mark chronicity , relapse , distress , functional impairment , increase risk future obesity , depression , suicide attempt , anxiety disorder , substance abuse , morbidity , mortality . Anorexia bulimia nervosa show strong relation suicide attempt , outpatient/inpatient treatment , functional impairment psychiatric disorder . Treatment eat disorder expensive , similar cost schizophrenia treatment , effective 40-60 % patient . Thus , public health priority develop disseminate effective eat disorder prevention program .
DOC.brief_title: Dissonance Eating Disorder Prevention : Clinician Led , Peer Led v Web Delivered
DOC.detailed_description: Although dozen eat disorder prevention program evaluate , dissonance-based program ( Body Project ) significantly reduce future onset threshold subthreshold eat disorder long-term follow-up . An effectiveness trial find Body Project produce significant reduction risk factor , eat disorder symptom , functional impairment relative educational brochure control , effect persist 3-yr follow-up high school clinician recruit student deliver program . These trial confirm efficacy effectiveness Body Project , reveal key dissemination barrier ; difficult identify recruit clinician high school college time expertise competently deliver program . One solution key dissemination barrier train student establish peer leader program colleges recruit high-risk student deliver program . Another solution dissemination barrier would deliver Body Project via Internet . Because peer-led group Internet delivery Body Project could markedly extend reach sustainability evidence-based program , propose conduct first large multi-site effectiveness trial directly compare effect cost effectiveness peer-led Body Project group , eBody Project intervention , clinician-led Body Project group educational video control condition .
